description:
Xelor, god of time, is a gambler. He's decided to organize a tournament bringing together the best fighters from every universe. He wants to have a good time, so why limit himself?
Take your pick of 14 characters and duke it out with your friends in the arena!

Krosfighter is an intense, no-holds-barred party game where you and your friends get to shoot each other, then start over with another character to test different shooting styles.
Be the best fighter to make it into the rankings and earn the blessing of the gods. The gods themselves might even drop in sometime during the game to turn everything upside down, blow things up, or reshuffle the deck! Players who are falling behind can take advantage of the chaos to get back in the game!

Krosfighter is fun for everyone, no matter what your level!

MAIN FEATURES:

• A FUN, NO-HOLDS-BARRED PARTY SHOOTER – Go head-to-head against your friends in two-to-four-player, steady but pressure-free battles where everyone can have fun and win!

• 14 DIVERSE CHARACTERS – Every style to satisfy every player!

• CASUAL AND EXPERT PLAYERS MEET IN THE ARENA – The most valiant fighters achieve victory by the sweat of their brow. The less adept can always call on the gods to help them win!

• UNPARALLELED PARTY GAME ATMOSPHERE – Laugh your heads off as you try to kill each other!

• EXPONENTIAL POWER – Each character has their own style and a power that demands to be unleashed.

• HEROS FROM KROSMOZ AND BEYOND – Yugo, Lance Dur, and their friends aren't the only ones to descend on the arena: Seth, Sherlock, and more have also joined the party!
name: Krosfighter
